i m scared of clowns.

content.text: Hey, how's your day going so far?
It's going well, thanks! I just got back from walking my dog.
Oh that's nice! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a Siberian Husky. He's a big ol' ball of fluff.
Huskies are awesome! They're so cute.
Thanks! I love him a lot.
What's your favorite thing to do with him?
We love to go for walks in the park. He loves to run around and play fetch.
That sounds really fun! I wish I had a dog.
They're great companions! You should definitely get one sometime.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! Have a good rest of your day!
